jdbcService.sql: select cc.child_id as component_id, cc.name, cc.min_occurs, cc.max_occurs, ct.name as child_template, ca.name as parent_anchor, lt.name as load_type, cc.id from component_child cc join load_type lt on cc.load_type_id = lt.id join component_anchor ca on cc.parent_anchor_id = ca.id join component_template ct on cc.child_template_id = ct.id where cc.parent_id = :parentId
